title: dewez

comments.author: dewez
comments.created_time: June 20, 2023, 06:55:20 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 05:14:41 PM by dewez
comments.body: [2023-11-29]Hello,I would like to introduce myself and invite everyone to try their luck at l0tt0.com!We have a signature campaign running, if you are interested in joining please reach out to BoXXoB.If you have any other questions please don't hesitate to ask. I'm active here and on telegram.Thank you for the warm welcome and I hope to see many (but not all) of you among the Top Winners!   Best,Josh (Owner)P.S. Shout out to Jayce for the ANN design.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: A warm welcome to the forum, and congratulations on this newly launched game, I have not actually visited the site so I don't know if it's a game or a casino, which ever it is, happy to have you serve the gambling community here, I am particularly happy about your plan to run a signature campaign in the coming days, that's a good move, but before you do that, I think it be much more better to have the op updated first with a more professional Ann of your platform, you could take a look at other casinos ann thread for some clue..Anyways, welcome and goodluck, I will be waiting to try out some of the games.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 20, 2023, 07:00:28 PMA warm welcome to the forum, and congratulations on this newly launched game, I have not actually visited the site so I don't know if it's a game or a casino, which ever it is, happy to have you serve the gambling community here, I am particularly happy about your plan to run a signature campaign in the coming days, that's a good move, but before you do that, I think it be much more better to have the op updated first with a more professional Ann of your platform, you could take a look at other casinos ann thread for some clue..Anyways, welcome and good luck, I will be waiting to try out some of the games. I just finished checking the site out and I must say that the site has very simple designs and is much more of a lottery rather than a full casino where other games are available because the only game i saw on the site is Bitcoin price prediction games by choosing a number which is the lottery number and once the number os the lucky number the predictor becomes the lottery winner.I don't know if there is the development of other games underway, but then we must give the team a warm welcome just as you have done and hope to see more positive outcomes from this casino.

comments.author: dewez
comments.created_time: June 20, 2023, 07:17:06 PMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 04:57:52 PM by dewez
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on June 20, 2023, 07:14:54 PMthe site and the games seemed innovative to me, but the question is the following: before creating your gambling site, did you do any research to find out if there is a lot of demand for games of this type? because what I have observed over the years is that people are more interested in dice games, sots, sports betting, card games, but have no interest in lottery games, many lottery sites have already appeared in this forum and in the last ones years I don't see the ann thread of these lottery sites having any active commentsthis shows that people, despite putting money into gambling, something that depends on luck, they don't put money on lottery games, which is also something that depends on luck, maybe they don't put money on the lottery because they look at the lottery as something very harder for them to earn money compared to slot games or sports betting. anyway I believe that with your signature campaign running we will have a good idea if these lottery games have really attracted people's attention or not. Do you intend to do some kind of contest and promotions? this has also helped a lot in marketingthey are instant games.. so if you like slots or scratch off tickets- you'll like my games.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.

I will be managing the signature campaign for l0tt0.com.

comments.author: BoXXoB
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 07:19:39 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.  I wondered the same. But it seems like it has been integrated as part of the brand (looking at the logo) so I guess it is fine. Interested to see how the site will do.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 07:19:39 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.  Yeah, you are very correct about such domains not being search engine friendly, and apart from that, some users without paying attention to the alphabets might mistake the domain spelling for lotto.com which I believe will lead them to an entirely different site.I think the op was trying to use the popularity of the word "lotto" to see if he could draw traffic to his site, but unfortunately, the domain "lotto" is long taken, so he has to look for something that is pretty similar, but still, for me, the choice of "l0tt0" is a bad choice, it would have been better if he had chosen a domain name more unique on its own.

comments.author: dewez
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 20, 2023, 07:34:34 PMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 07:19:39 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.  Yeah, you are very correct about such domains not being search engine friendly, and apart from that, some users without paying attention to the alphabets might mistake the domain spelling for lotto.com which I believe will lead them to an entirely different site.I think the op was trying to use the popularity of the word "lotto" to see if he could draw traffic to his site, but unfortunately, the domain "lotto" is long taken, so he has to look for something that is pretty similar, but still, for me, the choice of "l0tt0" is a bad choice, it would have been better if he had chosen a domain name more unique on its own. It's actually more about old school hacker type.. i wanted the brand to have a retro look and feel. I personally love it. I hope it will grow on all of you. I disagree about the SEO comment.. SEO has to do with the keywords on the site.. Your main search traffic is from keyword searches.the site is not for everyone. it's for people who are looking for unique games-not the same old stuff.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 20, 2023, 07:34:34 PMsome users without paying attention to the alphabets might mistake the domain spelling for lotto.com which I believe will lead them to an entirely different site. Not some, I think most of the targeted audience will do this mistake at least once LOLLotto.com is a premium domain and they have similar product so the original lotto will get free visitors from their marketing 😉Quotebut still, for me, the choice of "l0tt0" is a bad choice, it would have been better if he had chosen a domain name more unique on its own.We can't make a conclusion. With consistency and dedication a name can brand themselves and can make a space in their users mind. I hope they have enough marketing budget and they do enough business to spend money on marketing.Quote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 07:21:15 PMThank you for the welcome. The name is the name. I get that and all the best.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: BoXXoB on June 20, 2023, 07:23:05 PMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 07:19:39 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.  I wondered the same. But it seems like it has been integrated as part of the brand (looking at the logo) so I guess it is fine. Interested to see how the site will do.I would have no problem if that of the logo or the new incoming ANN take as much advantage as possible of the zeros to make the service to be highlighted among so many other which are in the market. I am not an expert at marketing but the first thing that comes to mind when thinking about a lottery and zeros, is the small possibility of getting a check with a lot of zeros on it. If you know what I mean.  Perhaps, if they come up with an original idea like that one, I could see some people giving this new lotto a chance. Eager to see what kind of design you end up choosing for your signature campaign.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 07:19:39 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comYou could have a better domain name. With these 0s (zeros) it really unusual for users to type and make sense. I understand it gives you better options for branding but your targeted audience need to get used to type numbers with letters. Also I think these type of domain are not search engine friendly too.But nonetheless, welcome to bitcointalk community.  I swear, when I saw the domain name I was like what is that? Because I'm most case using of 0 in a domain is from scammers and not for real sites. Either it is from artificial sites or for a dubious reasons. The site is very much simple to understand. And since the project is a new one it will need more customers in to visit the site and if the op need that he has to contact a manager to handle a signature campaign for more popularity.

comments.author: BoXXoB
comments.body: Signature campaign post has been made: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457028.0

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comWelcome to Bitcointalk forum!I always loved the idea of using Bitcoin for lotteries so few years ago I created a topic to track and update all new lotto websites that accept Bitcoin.L0tt0 was added today in my topic, I just registered to explore it more, and I would like to hear your what are your plans for the future.Is there a way to use your website with Bitcoin testnet coins for testing, before using real BTC?This is my All Bitcoin Lottery websites topic:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278167.0

comments.author: dewez
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on June 20, 2023, 09:20:40 PMQuote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 06:43:24 PMI just launched my new website. https://www.l0tt0.comWelcome to Bitcointalk forum!I always loved the idea of using Bitcoin for lotteries so few years ago I created a topic to track and update all new lotto websites that accept Bitcoin.L0tt0 was added today in my topic, I just registered to explore it more, and I would like to hear your what are your plans for the future.Is there a way to use your website with Bitcoin testnet coins for testing, before using real BTC?This is my All Bitcoin Lottery websites topic:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278167.0Thanks man, Thats an interesting idea... I'll look into it. For now.. send me a msg with the email you signed up with and I'll give you $10 of free play.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: dewez on June 20, 2023, 09:32:03 PMThanks man, Thats an interesting idea... I'll look into it. For now.. send me a msg with the email you signed up with and I'll give you $10 of free play.Thank you for kind offer, and better watch out if I win big reward I wished if there was different way of registration without email, or maybe we could be given random usernames for situations like this, or we could add custom unique user name.This would be much better for privacy and we could avoid email leaks.Testnet coins could be used for demo learning mode, like we are doing when playing in all casinos.
